course.title: Reading Hollywood: Feminist Film Theory
course.description: This course examines the construction of desire, pleasure, and fantasy in Hollywood film. Drawing on current debates in feminist film theory - as well as on related fields such as queer theory, critical race theory, and psychoanalysis - the course focuses on theories of the gaze, fetishization, racialization, heteronormativity, and the subversive potential of mainstream film.
